channel.title: Blogs on Stefanos Vardalos
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Stefanos Vardalos

item.title: Electron Application
item.description: Electron / Angular JS CommonClient Project This is a basic development guide for the CommonClient Project. It includes stuff about the project structure, the electron modules, the renderer application (with AngularJS library) and every other key factor that should be mentioned (like static code analysis, proper commenting, unit tests, etc). It will be constantly updated along the way through the development process. Installation Prerequisites Install Node.JS through official site or (better) nvm Install/Update npm npm install npm@latest -g Project install git clone commonClient_gitURL cd osbiz_desktop npm install cd app npm install cd .

item.title: firstpost
item.description: Angular JS Project This is a basic boilerplate to kickstart your next Angular 1.x project, along with some useful tools. Includes Basic Node.JS server Angular App Folder Structure Widely Used Dependencies angular-ui-bootstrap angular-ui-router bootstrap font-awesome Widely Used Developer Dependencies dgeni eslint gulp jasmine-core karma Unit Testing Suite ( Karma and Jasmine ) Coverage Tool Linter Tool ( EsLint ) Documentation Generator ( Dgeni ) Installation Prerequisites Install Node.
